Damage_Resistance.display_help: Maelstrom is resistant to some damage types.

Chemical_Ammunition.display_help: Your weapons are loaded with chemical ammunition.

Twin_Pistols.display_help: Dual Wield fires both pistols in rapid succession at its desired target. This power is slower than Pistols, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

Twin_Pistols2.display_help: Dual Wield fires both pistols in rapid succession at its desired target. This power is slower than Pistols, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

Toxic_Rain.display_help: You fire your pistols faster than the human eye can follow, causing your bullet trajectory to arc, dealing moderate Lethal damage and possibly knocking your foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from Knockback to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.

Piercing_Rounds.display_help: You fire your pistols with deadly precision in a very narrow cone, piercing your enemy. Piercing Rounds deals High lethal damage and reduces targets' Damage Resistance for a short time. Damage: High Recharge: Long NOTE: Changing your ammo type with the 'Swap Ammo' power will change your secondary damage from lethal to cold, fire or toxic. Additionally, changing your ammunition type will also change the secondary effect of this attack from a resistance debuff to a minor attack speed and movement speed debuff if 'Cryo Ammo' is loaded, a minor damage over time effect if 'Incendiary Ammo' is loaded, or a -damage effect if 'Chemical Ammo' is loaded.
Piercing_Rounds.display_target_help: Your damage resistance has been reduced.

NO2_Ammunition.display_help: Your weapons are loaded with cryo-rounds, causing cold damage.

Shredder_Round.display_help: Maelstrom quickly fires a round from his remaining heavy automatic pistol.

Executioners_Shot.display_help: Executioner's Shot is a deadly close range attack. Foes struck by this attack will suffer lethal damage and will likely be knocked back by the impact of this attack.

Marked_For_Death.display_help: Maelstrom marks nearby enemies for death.
Marked_For_Death.display_target_help: You have been Marked for Death. If Maelstrom uses Assassination while you are marked, and you remain within range of that power, you will die instantly. Back away from Maelstrom!

Time_To_Die.display_help: Maelstrom attempts to assassinate all nearby targets. Those who are Marked for Death die instantly, while those without the mark still suffer heavy damage.
Time_To_Die.display_target_help: You have been targeted for assassination. If you are Marked for Death, this attack will kill you outright. If you are not Marked, you suffer heavy cold damage but might survive the attack.
Time_To_Die.display_attacker_attack_floater: Maelstrom prepares to kill those Marked for Death!

Storm_Kick.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Storm Kick has a greater then average chance to score a critical hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Crane_Kick.display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals slightly more damage than Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

Storm_Kick_Jaunt.display_help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your foes before delivering a powerful Storm Kick. Note that Storm Kick is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Fast

Crane_Kick_Jaunt.display_help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your target before delivering a crushing Crane Kick. Note that Crane Kick is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Moderate

Dragons_Tail_Chain.display_help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your target before striking with the Dragon's Tail attack. Note that Dragon's Tail Chain is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow

Dragons_Tail_Jaunt.display_help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your target before striking with the Dragon's Tail attack. Note that Dragon's Tail is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Very Fast

Whirlwind_Burst_Tell.display_help: You perform a Whirlwind Burst that deals smashing damage to all nearby targets and knocks them back, putting them in range of your Teleport Kicks. Recharge: Slow

Whirlwind_Burst.display_help: You perform a Whirlwind Burst that deals smashing damage to all nearby targets and knocks them back, putting them in range of your Teleport Kicks.

Aura.display_help: This citizen has been persuaded to attack you and your allies by the IDF Telepathists!
Aura.display_target_help: This citizen has been persuaded to attack you and your allies by the IDF Telepathists!

Rock.display_help: Citizens can pick up small rocks and throw them at their foes. Not much damage.
Rock.display_target_help: Prisoners can pick up a small rocks and throw then at their foes. Not much damage.

Molotov_Cocktail.display_help: The explosion from the Fire Bomb affects all within the blast and sets them on fire.
Molotov_Cocktail.display_target_help: The explosion from the Fire Bomb affects all within the blast and sets them on fire.

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.
Brawl.display_target_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

Vengeance.display_help: The defeat of a citizen causes the remaining protesters to rally, granting all nearby citizens a combat performance buff.
Vengeance.display_target_help: The defeat of a citizen causes the remaining protesters to rally, granting all nearby citizens a combat performance buff.
Vengeance.display_victim_hit: You fallen teammate has inspired you with {PowerName}.

Burn.display_help: All foes that pass through these flames will be burned.

Grant_Protest.display_help: This citizen has been persuaded to attack you and your allies by the IDF Telepathists!

Grant_North_Escape.display_help: This citizen has been persuaded to attack you and your allies by the IDF Telepathists!

Grant_South_Escape.display_help: This citizen has been persuaded to attack you and your allies by the IDF Telepathists!

Fleeing_North.display_help: This citizen has been persuaded to attack you and your allies by the IDF Telepathists!

Fleeing_South.display_help: This citizen has been persuaded to attack you and your allies by the IDF Telepathists!

Protesting.display_help: This citizen has been persuaded to attack you and your allies by the IDF Telepathists!

Signal_Interference.display_help: The TPN Technician is interfering with your signal, allowing broadcasts loyal to Emperor Cole to break through to the masses.
Signal_Interference.display_target_help: The TPN Technician is interfering with your signal, allowing broadcasts loyal to Emperor Cole to break through to the masses.

Impenetrable_Shielding.display_help: The TPN Technician has a special shield generator which renders them effectively invincible as long as other IDF forces remain nearby. The shield goes down, however, as soon as all backup is lost.
Impenetrable_Shielding.display_target_help: The TPN Technician has a special shield generator which renders them effectively invincible as long as other IDF forces remain nearby. The shield goes down, however, as soon as all backup is lost.

Propaganda.display_help: The Telepathist has affected the minds of the citizens observing the assault on TPN and has turned them against you. Citizens affected by a Telepathists propaganda will attack using a variety of means at their disposal.
Propaganda.display_target_help: The Telepathist has affected the minds of the citizens observing the assault on TPN and has turned them against you. Citizens affected by a Telepathists propaganda will attack using a variety of means at their disposal.

Pacify.display_help: You maintain a continual aura of pacification, reducing the combat effectiveness of enemy targets.
Pacify.display_target_help: The Telepathists maintain a continual aura of pacification, reducing the combat effectiveness of enemy targets. While under the effects of pacification, your defenses, resistances, damage and chance to hit are all negatively impacted.

Telepathic_Interference.display_help: You maintain a field of interference around you which damages the neural pathways of enemies. Those around you take continual damage over time.
Telepathic_Interference.display_target_help: The Telepathist maintains a continuous localized aura which damages the neural pathways of her enemies. You suffer continuous psionic damage while in the aura's field.
